page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Our area has three villages,Kirkburton which has most shops, Highburton which is mostly residential, and the small village of Farnley. Many people travel to work in nearby towns like Leeds, Huddersfield and Sheffield. We like to look after our villages and gardening is a very popular hobby. In Farnley all the houses have gardens and most people do some gardening at least once a week. They like to have flowers and lawns best, but a quarter of them also grow their own vegetables. There are many other things to do in our area. You can go horse riding, join the village cricket team or even go bowling. At Farnley there is a bowling green and you can take sandwiches and sit on the terrace to watch. Really we are very lucky to live in such a beautiful part of Yorkshire.
